name: Check that all pages are in the same language

steps.name: Check language selection button is enabled
Check English language button is enabled
Check title 'Find your next stay' is in English
Check that title 'Car rentals for any kind of trip' in English
Check title 'Find and book a great experience'
Check that title 'Compare and book flights with ease' in English
